message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small chunk, but I'm holding out for a better deal!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving away too much!
I'll give you a tiny, tiny bit, but I'm still not giving in!
I'm running out of patience, but I'm still willing to negotiate!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
I'm getting close to giving up, but I'll make one more decent offer!
I'm almost out of options, but I'll make one last stand!
I'm running out of options too, but I'll make one last attempt!
I've got nothing left to lose, take it or leave it!
